banner_h6: Don’t look further, here is the key
banner_h1: We’re connect you to the Brazilians suppliers
banner_p: We are a trading company specialized in providing all kind of commodities around the world.
work_choice_p: When you decide what's your needs, Choose us to make the best deal. We offer diverse options to contact us and we always ready to help you grow your industry.
work_shop_p:
We have a shopping platform, go to our shop section and choose what you need in your cart and make a free quote request. Just simple as that.
We will answer in 48hs with all details, ready to close business.
work_quote_p: Need something special or product not in the shopping section, go to the Quotation section and request products or commodities we provide. Just send us your specification and we will respond in 48hs.
work_contact_p:
Have a comment or any needs. Contact us by email, WhatsApp, Telegram.
We will be happy to help!
about_h1:
Your satisfaction is
Our main goal
about_sub:
We are here to listen
To deliver you the best quality and price
about_p:
Saqqi Commercial Exportadora LTDA is a registered trading company specialized in commodities and manufacturers importation & exportation business in Brazil. We provide all kinds of goods for countries around the world with the partnership we established with Brazilian manufacturers. We have a selected group of manufacturers committed with the environment protection and have implemented a sustainable production process following international standards.
Our main goal is to connect Brazilian companies to other companies around the world offering the best quality and price in order to create great business contact and relationships.
services_1_p: Brazil is the third-largest producer of pulp and paper in the world. Exporting office supplies, kraft paper, corrugated paper, and all derivatives.
services_2_p: Brazil ranks amongst the top 10 steel and aluminum producing countries in the world. Brazil export steel, aluminum, copper and many other minerals and derivatives.
services_3_p: Brazil is the third-largest footwear and derivatives producer in the world, being the third-largest shoe and accessories manufacturer in the world.
services_4_p: Brazil is the world’s largest producer and exporter of coffee, sugar, and orange juice, and is highly ranked in the production and export of soybean, corn, ethanol, pork, beef, poultry chicken, chicken paws, etc.
about_footer_p:
Saqqi Commercial Exportadora LTDA, We specialized in exporting paper and pulp products since we based in the third worldwide paper producer. Supplying the best export paper products such as Kraft paper bags, Natural Kraft paper rolls, corrugated, newsprint, and monolucent paper rolls among other products. We also provide agricole products like soybeans, yellow maize, etc, Steel and aluminum, and many other commodities.
With our dynamic team always ready to serve we look forward to a wonderful relationship together and success for all concerned.
